result.execSummary:
The defendant Mary E Berning was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of Methamphetamine, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(g).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Must sign up for probation by 4:00 PM tomorrow 2/17/17.

miscConds.notes:
If probation or extended supervision is allowed to expire or is revoked with outstanding financial obligations, the supervising agent shall notify the court 10 days prior to the revocation or discharge and provide current financial information.  A civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and governmental entities for any balances due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect all debt.  Attorney Fees To Be Determined.  Probation does NOT collect attorney fees.
03/10/17 CORRECTED TO AMEND THE DNA SURCHARGE ASSESSED FROM $200.00 TO $250.00 BASED ON THE FELONY OFFENSE.

Must maintain absolute sobriety. Must not possess or consume controlled substances unless prescribed by a licensed health care provider and only taken in the amounts prescribed.  Must have no contact with Tracy Darling or Craig Greenwold.

Must complete any and all evaluations, counseling, treatment and follow-up recommended by Probation Agent.  Must submit DNA sample and pay the surcharge.  Order for DNA given to the defendant in court. Must report to Barron County Jail on today by 4:00 PM, to submit DNA sample.

timeConds.notes: Court grants 1 day jail credit if revoked from probation.
Must complete 100 hours per year on probation for a total of 200 hours.

SW 
2 years probation.  Must sign up for probation by 4:00 p.m. tomorrow 2/17/17.
Must have no contact whatsoever with Tracy Darling or Craig Greenwold. 
1 day jail credit if probation is revoked.
Must complete 100 hours of community service for each year of probation, totaling 200 hours.

Must complete any and all evaluations, counseling, treatment and follow-up recommended by Probation Agent.
